text: An American in Paris is a 1951 American musical comedy movie directed by Vincente Minnelli and was based on the musical of the same name by George Gershwin. It stars Gene Kelly, Leslie Caron, Oscar Levant, Georges Gu√©tary, Nina Foch, Eugene Borden and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for 8 Oscars and won 6 Academy Awards in 1952. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 comedy movies Category:1951 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Vincente Minnelli Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in Paris Category:1950s English-language movies
title: An American in Paris (movie)
